level.heading: Uniformity of application and construction.
level.text: In applying and construing this uniform act, consideration must be given to the need to promote uniformity of the law with respect to its subject matter among states that enact it.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-137
level.text: For history of Law 19-137, see notes under ยง 1-1061.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on ยง 19 of the Uniform Military and Overseas Voters Act.
